title: Development of Multimodal Peer Assessment Strategies in Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic design principles and foundational science curriculum content
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Science subject design project course for pre-service teacher training.

learning_goals: Learners can provide feedback on design work with over 80% accuracy by applying multimodal (simultaneous audio, text, chat) peer assessment methods
Learners can create real-time collaborative evaluation documents using Google Docs and digital tools, enhancing structured feedback capabilities
Learners lead knowledge exchange among peers of varying expertise levels at least three times by integrating interactions from open discussions and backchannel chats
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
